import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import AddSynonym from './AddSynonym' import { updateContent, getAllEntity, removeContent } from '../actions' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Modal from './Modal' function AddEntityTable({ entity, el, removSynonym, handelSubmitSynonym, dispatch, fb, index }) { const [inputState, setInputState] = useState(true) return (
{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(updateContent({ id: entity._id, idChildren: el._id, name: e.target.content.value })) .then(() => { setInputState(true); dispatch(getAllEntity(fb)) } ) }}> {!inputState && }
{el.synonyms.map((child, i) => (child && {child} ) )} }> {close => (

 )} ) } export default connect(state => ({ fb: state.fbdata.tokenDetail.userID }))(AddEntityTable)
